home.title: Welcome
home.introduction: Integrations with data available publicly and from private domain to process, analyse and launch downstream processes which otherwise were time-consuming and error prone.
home.tab1-text: Own internet address (domain), web site, e-mail box, user management, cloud storage in Google Cloud.
home.tab2-text: Backend: Java > Spring, Cloud > GCP, Digitalocean. Fontend: Vuejs

login.title: Login

email.email: Please enter a valid email address.
email.maxLength: Field '@:login.email-label' must have at most {maxlength} characters.

password.maxLength: Field '@:login.password-label' exeeds max length of {maxlength} characters.

login.auth/user-not-found: There is no user record corresponding to this identifier. The user may have been deleted.
login.auth/wrong-password: The password is invalid or the user does not have a password.
login.auth/too-many-requests: Too many unsuccessful login attempts. Please try again later.
